bibl.title: Annotations on Demosthenes 23. 103 (In Aristocratem). Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Transcription and discussion of three previously unread marginal annotations in P. Mich. Schwendner 7 (= P. Mich. Inv. 0.2) (= Mertens-Pack3 313.01, LDAB 719). Provenance unknown, III A.D. The notes are a subsequent addition. Their purpose is to facilitate reading: no new information is supplied.
bibl.seg: McNAMEE Kathleen, Annotations on Demosthenes 23. 103 (In Aristocratem). Avec résumé en anglais.

Transcription and discussion of three previously unread marginal annotations in P. Mich. Schwendner 7 (= P. Mich. Inv. 0.2) (= Mertens-Pack3 313.01, LDAB 719). Provenance unknown, III A.D. The notes are a subsequent addition. Their purpose is to facilitate reading: no new information is supplied.
